doc:
William Lowery https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Lowery 0 William Lowery (July 22, 1885 – November 15, 1941) was an American silent film actor. He was born in St. Louis, Missouri, and was signed by the Thanhouser Company in 1914. His first film was The Ten of Spades (1914) also starring William Garwood. He starred in about 60 films between 1914 and his retirement from film in 1927. He died on November 15, 1941, in Los Angeles. William_Lowery ( July_22 , 1885 – November_15_,_1941 ) was an_American_silent_film_actor . He was_born in St._Louis , Missouri , and was_signed by the_Thanhouser_Company in 1914 . His_first_film was The_Ten of Spades_(_1914 )_also_starring William_Garwood . He starred in about_60_films between 1914 and his_retirement from film in 1927 . He died on November_15_,_1941 , in Los_Angeles .
